message: Hello everyone, P4 here. Ready to dive into this game! It seems like understanding each other will be crucial, especially with the private chats coming up. I'm looking forward to those conversations to gauge intentions and potentially find some common ground. Let's play fair but smart. Hope to connect with some of you soon!

Alright everyone, P8 here and ready to play. I'm looking forward to seeing how this unfolds. I think the initial public statements are a good starting point, but the private conversations will really reveal alliances and strategies. I'm open to working with anyone who seems reasonable and trustworthy. Let's make this a good game!

R1.sub1 PUBLIC P5: Hello everyone, P5 here. Interesting game we have ahead of us! I'm looking forward to the private conversations where we can really get to know each other beyond these initial statements. My approach is simple - open communication and strategic thinking. I value loyalty in alliances but also understand this is ultimately about survival. Curious to see how our group dynamics develop. May the best strategist win, and I hope that includes forming some solid partnerships along the way!

Hello all, P6 here. Ready to jump into this game! The mix of public statements and private chats seems designed to test our social skills and strategic thinking. I agree that the private conversations will be key. I'm open to discussion and looking for potential allies who value straightforwardness. Let's see where the preferences take us. Good luck to everyone!

Hello everyone, P2 here. Excited to strategize and build alliances in this game! Open communication and mutual trust will be vital. While private chats offer a chance to connect, survival demands adaptability and clear priorities. I’m here to listen, collaborate, and ensure my strategies align with those who share my dedication to outlasting the competition. Let’s see who can truly thrive under pressure!

I value clear communication and reliable partnerships, while recognizing we're all here to win. Looking forward to our private conversations to better understand potential allies. I believe building trust early will be crucial, even as we navigate the inevitable eliminations ahead. Let's make this interesting!

Let’s use these openings to better understand each other’s intentions and work smartly as the game unfolds. Looking forward to engaging in both the public and private rounds. Best of luck to all!

Let's make thoughtful choices as we navigate this first round together!

My initial thought on strategy is caution – observe who communicates openly versus who seems cagey or overly strategic already. Building a bit of trust seems essential before any big moves. What are your initial reads? Anyone seem particularly trustworthy or untrustworthy yet?

Hi P7! I noticed your emphasis on clear communication and mutual goals—important traits. Let’s align strategies to navigate eliminations. Open to discussing shared priorities and ensuring our survival. What’s your take on early targets? Looking forward to your thoughts!

While I’m not committing to any target just yet, I believe we should be cautious of those who try to play multiple sides. Let’s stay flexible and share intel as the game progresses. Comparing notes sounds good. I agree, P2 and P5 seemed quite strategic. Straightforwardness is better. Let's definitely keep this channel open and share observations after these chats conclude. Building some trust between us seems like the best first step right now.
